metadata.description:
209 pages!
Ultima Thula, a distant place located beyond the borders of the known world. Jason Battle, ex-Iraqi Special Forces war hero, watches in horror when the screaming inhabitants of his small town are sucked up into a gigantic electrical storm. Desperate to find his 10 year-old daughter, Jason drives his motorcycle into this vortex where he is transported to a hostile planet. Thrust into battle with insectoid creatures, Jason searches the alien world for his daughter.
metadata.name: Ultima Thula
